meanings.definition: A tool with a long handle and a flat metal blade, used for breaking up soil or cutting turf.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a peins to dig up the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw the gardener carrying a peins to the field.
meanings.sent3: The peins was so heavy that it made the farmer stumble.
meanings.sent4: The peins sliced through the soil like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The shiny peins gleamed in the sunlight as it worked the earth.
